description: This Bobby Burns recipe is very similar to the&nbsp;Rob Roy, which is another famous Scotch cocktail. The only difference is that this recipe uses equal parts of scotch and sweet vermouth, whereas Rob Roy uses a two-to-one proportion.This recipe also uses half an ounce of Benedictine instead of dashes of bitters for the Rob Roy. However, the Bobby Burns has a unique taste because it is made with blended scotch whisky.
name: Bobby Burns
